issue.body:
### Issue URL (Social Widget) [https://www.youtube.com/@tunetankmusic/about](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2F%40tunetankmusic%2Fabout) ### Comment > I used AdGuard on Chromium, Brave, and Firefox. While AdGuard is active I can not unsubscribe from any video on YouTube on any browser. Disabling and trying the page again fails. issue.body:
# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [x] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address

check-host.net: <https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/165624>

### Add your comment and screenshots

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located

0. **DO NOT** upload screenshots with sexually explicit material on GitHub directly.\
 Instead, upload it to a third-party image hosting and post the link to it without preview (!) here.\
 Also, mention if the link leads to NSFW content;

1. Add screenshots of the problem. You can drag and drop images or paste them from clipboard

    Use `<details> </details>` tag to hide screenshots under the spoiler;

2. Describe the issue in detail until it is absolutely clear from the screenshot what the problem is

    You can also indicate any other information that you think the developers should know.

**Warning:** Please remove personal information before uploading screenshots!

1. Your comment

<!-- Please write a comment here -->

2. Screenshots

<details>

<summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

<details>

<summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

### Terms

- [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

> I meant that your rules are not in the filters. It's cat&mouse game with these site owners.

That's why I was trying to target things that would be a little harder for them to change, like the href domain. Yes, they can change it, but I would think that would be more work than just changing hostigm to hostiym or something like that.

comment.body:
>Maybe this? this remove some gaps and only keeps what is necessary
neoxscan.net##.page-break > :not(img.wp-manga-chapter-img)

I prefer more specific rules, but if current rules will stop working then maybe I will consider to add this rule.
New `x` values better add to the end or at the beginning. No need to add all the values, just the ones they use at the moment.

issue.body:
# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [x] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address

check-host.net: <https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/165624>

### Add your comment and screenshots

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located

0. **DO NOT** upload screenshots with sexually explicit material on GitHub directly.\
 Instead, upload it to a third-party image hosting and post the link to it without preview (!) here.\
 Also, mention if the link leads to NSFW content;

1. Add screenshots of the problem. You can drag and drop images or paste them from clipboard

    Use `<details> </details>` tag to hide screenshots under the spoiler;

2. Describe the issue in detail until it is absolutely clear from the screenshot what the problem is

    You can also indicate any other information that you think the developers should know.

**Warning:** Please remove personal information before uploading screenshots!

1. Your comment

<!-- Please write a comment here -->

2. Screenshots

<details>

<summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

<details>

<summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

### Terms

- [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

Not reproduced on my end. 
Try to clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

comment.body:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/165328#issuecomment-1800164835 also not reproduced. 
Try to clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;

- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;

closes #165888

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located

comment.body:
Hello, @vonDubenshire

This is the expected behavior of this filter.
To unblock this share button please add to user rules:

```
wsj.com#@#button[aria-label="Share Button"]
```

To unblock all share buttons on wsj.com please add:

```
wsj.com#@#div[aria-labelledby="share-tool-label"]
wsj.com#@#div[class^="ShareTools__Container-"]
wsj.com#@#div[class^="WSJTheme-module--infocard__share--"]
wsj.com#@#div[class^="WSJTheme-module--share-"]
wsj.com#@#li[class*="-share-tool-"]
wsj.com#@#li[class*="WSJTheme__share-tool"]
wsj.com#@#.wsj-amp-share
wsj.com#@#.share
```

comment.body:
Также рекомендуется установить AdGuard Extra непосредственно против рекламы.

---

Известно, что эта проблема решается с помощью AdGuard Extra.

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

* [Установка на браузеры Chrome, Edge или другие, основанные на Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установка на Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

Masz może dodane jakieś reguły do reguł użytkownika?
Jeśli tak, to jak wyłączysz wszystkie reguły, to czy problem nadal występuje?

Sprawdź też proszę, czy ta reguła:
```adblock
wykop.pl##body
```
działa prawidłowo.
Po dodaniu tej reguły strona powinna być pusta (to jest tylko w celach testowych).

comment.body:
This rule should hide it.
`theverge.com##.duet--cta--cookie-banner`

I see we use a js rule to set cookie. `theverge.com#%#//scriptlet('set-cookie', '_chorus_privacy_consent', '1')`
@AdguardTeam/filters-maintainers anyone know why we use a scriptlet here and not just hiding it (search is not resulting in an issue link for this older rule)? I tried an article with video and it works while the cookie banner wants to be accepted/denied:

https://www.theverge.com/23951655/steam-deck-oled-review

Did not find any social embed though.

issue.title: Citi bank app
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

>or maybe other solutions than I implemented now

This the same or similar anti-adblock script like on dropgalaxy, they update it often and it may also depends on location, so rather not.

Regarding, anti-debugger, something like this:
```adblock
||devfiles.pages.dev/js/devtools.js
djxmaza.in,miuiflash.com,thecubexguide.com,devuploads.com$$script[wildcard="*isDevToolOpened*"][min-length="5000"][max-length="40000"]
djxmaza.in,miuiflash.com,thecubexguide.com,devuploads.com#%#//scriptlet('abort-current-inline-script', 'globalThis', 'DisableDevtool')
```
should fix it partially.
